about_the_game:
This is a world without ending, no boundaries, can experience a variety of battles in the game, the game will be in a linear form for players to explore, the game will be continuously developed and constantly updated new content

In the game, players need to grow stronger, learn more skills to deal with powerful enemies in the old world, and cultivate peers for more support. Enemies can be challenging, but you're not alone



·3D view, keyboard control movement, mouse control view, horror action games
· Character development system, where players can Upgrade at the character's abilities as the game progresses

· A challenging combat system where players must always be alert


· Players can prompt their own combat experience through equipment forging, skill learning and other ways
A variety of challenging bosses'


The game is in intensive production, I have been working full time on development, will update the game monthly, and will continue to iterate on the quality of the game to give the player a better experience
